channel.title: Interstate Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Interstate Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West (Idaho Street) approaching NV-225 North (Mountain City Highway and Silver St.). Use NV-225 north (Mountain City Highway) to Boise (Idaho). Continue west on BL-80/NV-535 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: ID-38 East at South Main St.
item.description: ID-38 East (90 S) at South Main St. in Malad City. Turn left on S Main St to continue east on ID-38 and for I-15 to Ogden (UT) and Pocatello.

item.title: End Yale Road at ID-81
item.description: End Yale Road at ID-81. Turn left for ID-81 south to Malta; right for ID-81 north to Declo.

item.title: End NV-305 North at BL-80/NV-304
item.description: End of NV-305 at BL-80/NV-304. Turn right on BL-80/NV-304 for Elko; turn left on BL-80/NV-304 for Winnemucca.

item.title: US-95 Alt. South/US-50 Alt. West at NV-427 North
item.description: US-95A South/US-50A West/BL-80 West at US-95A South to Carson City, Yerington, and Las Vegas. Use BL-80 West and NV-427 North to Reno.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201. Use OR-201 South/US-20 East/US-26 East to Nyssa and Caldwell (ID). Use OR-201 North for Ontario and I-84.

item.title: AZ-143 North - Exit 2 and Exit 3AB
item.description: AZ-143 north at Exit 2 - University Drive. Approaching Exit 3A - AZ-202 Loop East and Exit 3B - Sky Harbor Airport. The AZ-202 Loop shield appears to be faded. Normally AZ-202 Loop is a brown color.

item.title: AZ-87 South at US-60
item.description: AZ-87 South (Country Club Dr) at US-60 west to Phoenix and east to Globe. Continue south on AZ-87 to Chandler and Coolidge.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 176A and Exit 175
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South. Approaching Exit 175 - McClintock Drive.

item.title: US-93 South Approaching US 60
item.description: US-93 south approaching US-60.

item.title: US-93 South - Entering Wickenburg
item.description: Entering Wickenburg on US-93 South. Elevation 2,093 Feet. Founded 1863.

item.title: BL-80/NV-289 at NV-794
item.description: BL-80/NV-289 (E. Second St.) at NV-794 (East Winnemucca Blvd.)

item.title: US-95 North/BL-80 in Winnemucca
item.description: BL-80 East/US-95 North (Winnemucca Blvd.) at US-95 north Melarkey St. Continue straight for BL-80 to Elko. Turn left for US-95 to Lakeview (OR) and Boise(ID).

item.title: US-287 North Approaching I-80
item.description: US-287 north approaching I-80.

item.title: ID-41 South at I-90 - Interstate Trucks
item.description: ID-41 south approaching I-90. All Interstate trucks must be weighed at Port of Entry on I-90 East.

item.title: Jct. I-90 on ID-41 South
item.description: ID-41 south approaching I-90.

item.title: WA-23 South at I-90 East
item.description: WA-23 south to Sprague and Spokane at I-90 east to Spokane.

item.title: US-2 West - BL-90 Exit - Airport/W. Spokane Split
item.description: US-2 West at offramp to BL-90/West Spokane and Spokane Airport.

item.title: US-2 West - BL-90 Exit
item.description: US-2 west at BL-90/West Spokane/Spokane Airport exit.

item.title: US-30 West/To I-86
item.description: US-30 West/To I-86 on Garrett Way.

item.title: US-30 West - Oak St./Garrett Way Jct.
item.description: US-30 west (Oak St.) at Garrett Way to American Falls and Twin Falls.

item.title: US-30 West To I-86 - Oak St.
item.description: US-30 West/To I-86 on Oak St. West.

item.title: US-91/US-30/BL-15 North at US-30 West
item.description: US-91 N./US-30 W./BL-15 N. at US-91/US-30 split. Continue on 5th Ave. for BL-15/US-91/To I-15/Blackfoot/Idaho Falls. Turn left on Oak St. for US-30/To I-86/American Falls/Twin Falls.

item.title: US-91/US-30/BL-15 North at US-30 West
item.description: US-91 North/US-30 West/BL-15 North approaching US-91/US-30 split. Continue on 5th Ave. for BL-15/US-91/To I-15/Blackfoot/Idaho Falls. Turn left on Oak St. for US-30/To I-86/American Falls/Twin Falls.

item.title: BL-15/US-30/US-91 Shields - Pocatello
item.description: BL-15/US-30/US-91 shields on S. 5th Ave. north.

item.title: US-91 North at ID-40 West
item.description: US-91 north at ID-40 west. Use ID-40 west for I-15 south. Use US-91 north for I-15 north.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east at ID-50 south. Use either ID-25 or ID-50 for I-84 access.

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at ID-25
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north at ID-25 (Main St.). Use ID-25 west for I-84 access. This is the terminus of former ID-79. The ID-79 shield used to be in between the I-84 and ID-25 shields.

item.title: US-30 West at BL-84
item.description: US-30 west at BL-84. Turn left for US-30 to Boise and Bliss. Turn right for US-26 and I-84 to Gooding.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching BL-84
item.description: US-30 west approaching BL-84/To US-26/To I-84 in Bliss.

item.title: US-30 West at US-95
item.description: US-30 west at US-95. Use US-95 north to Fruitland and Payette; south to I-84. US-30 joins US-95 north through Fruitland.

item.title: End WY-130/WY-230 at Curtis St.
item.description: End WY-130/WY-230 east at BL-80/Curtis St.

item.title: US-95 Alt. South at NV-427 North
item.description: US-95A South/BL-80 West at US-95A South to Carson City and Yerrington, and NV-427 North to Reno.

item.description: BL-80/US-95A South at US-50A junction.

item.title: US-95 Alt. South at US-50 Alt. East
item.description: BL-80 west at US-50A to Fallon, NAS Fallon, and Ely.

item.description: End AZ-95 south at US-95/BL-10

item.description: BL-40/Historic US-66 to Oatman on Beale St

item.description: To AZ-95/Bullhead City and downtown Needles

item.description: US-95 south at US-50 to Ely and Reno

item.description: NV-221 east at NV-766 north to Newmont Gold Mine and I-80

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72 - To I-84
item.description: To I-84 at ID-52/ID-72 junction. For I-84 east, follow ID-72 to New Plymouth. For I-84 west, follow Sand Hollow Road to Caldwell.

item.title: BL-80 West at NV-225
item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho Street) at NV-225 North. Use NV-225 north to Boise. Continue west on BL-80 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: Nevada Postmile - FR-407
item.description: Nevada Post Mile Marker at the Jessup exit (Exit 78) on I-80. The postmile refers to FR-407 - which is the internal number for a Frontage Road.
